channel.title: Bad news for MoparScape
channel.description:
I was looking around at jagex.com and saw under Jobs: Jagex is looking for: a in house lawyer
Description: The company is going through an exciting phase in this challenging, changing market and now requires an astute and confident commercial in-house lawyer to oversee all legal matters.
MoparScape vs. Law is not good news :(

item.title: Bad news for MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @Unlimitedfello Unlimitedfello
item.description:
@Unlimitedfello wrote:

This is also why i keep my server small with good updates.

item.title: Bad news for MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

Jagex will never be able to shut down the forums, they can bitch and moan and make everyone remove the clients, they have no rights over the servers nor do they have any rights over server discussion.

will never be as funny as the one they did to you still cracks me up at how they claimed ‘the logout button’

Read full topic

item.title: Bad news for MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Actually Frell, since you said that, I don’t know why people say ‘runescape sucks rsps ftw!!!’, servers are actually crappier than RuneScape.

Read full topic

item.title: Bad news for MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

The majority of you seem to think you’re above Jagex, yet NONE of you have created a server good enough to make Jagex really TRY to bring the site down.

They’re not worried about a bunch of 12 year olds hosting servers that need to be restarted every 10 minutes and highly unstable.

So no, you dnt pwn jahex!!! They cba to get into anything big against horrible copies of their game.

Now shut the fuck up about saying jagex = fagex HARHARHAR, because you were ALL once hooked on the game they created, and if you hated it so much you wouldn’t bother to play these shit servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Bad news for MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“str rockstar, post:38, topic:290914”]lol jagex cant do sh*t… moparscape will always go on, theirs to many servers for them to handle xD[/quote]They’re too scared of e-mailing, they won’t e-mail Moparishtebest, they’d rather take 500,000 dynamites into Moparisthebest’s area to kill him, and if it has to be done, kill themselves at it.

lesterknome:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/lawstuff To bad, we have a kick ass negotiator

Wow Mopar Pwned them, I thougth Jagex would of had more of an Advantage but it seems they underestimate Moparscapians

Can anyone Point me towards Jagex RuneScape Copyright?

item.title: Bad news for MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:24, topic:290914”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=384604.msg2885579#msg2885579 date=1248578683]

[quote author=lesterknome link=topic=384604.msg2885570#msg2885570 date=1248578101]
http://www.moparisthebest.com/lawstuff To bad, we have a kick ass negotiator
[/quote]Moparisthebest pwned those noobs lmao
[/quote]They had no evidence at all that he was breaking the law, or Jagex copyright, he never admitted to anything, so they had no choice but to be ‘pwned’.[/quote]I was going off what this her dude said. Lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Bad news for MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:30, topic:290914”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=384604.msg2885598#msg2885598 date=1248579323]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=384604.msg2885597#msg2885597 date=1248579283]

[quote author=`Rich link=topic=384604.msg2885594#msg2885594 date=1248579185]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=384604.msg2885590#msg2885590 date=1248579123]

[quote author=Telenim link=topic=384604.msg2885584#msg2885584 date=1248578911]

http://www.moparisthebest.com/lawstuff To bad, we have a kick ass negotiator
[/quote]Moparisthebest pwned those noobs lmao
[/quote]They had no evidence at all that he was breaking the law, or Jagex copyright, he never admitted to anything, so they had no choice but to be ‘pwned’.
[/quote]And plus he proved the point as how, the things that are released here are scratch from something, that one of us made, and how most are open source, so it’s not stealing from Jagex, but each other

…the clients?
[/quote]Server.

I meant it as in, “what about the clients?”
[/quote]Oh haha, um, they don’t have evidence though, like whatshisface said? I’m confusing myself o.O[/quote]

what the fuck, they don’t have evidence? are you joking?

Read full topic
